name: reacting-to-me
description: This is a version of my portfolio created using React. It utilizes the necessary components and practices to be a SPA. The application includes an about me page, a page to showcase some of my best work, a contact form page, and a page that lists my skills and links to a copy of my resume.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.develop-tailwind: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run start-tailwind"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
